ing: 1 teaspoon fat-free, sugar-free vanilla pudding mix (such as Jell-oÂ®)
des: "Here is a simple and delicious protein shake that won't break your wallet."
ins: Blend ice, almonds, and 1/4 cup water in a blender until the almonds have been pulverized. Add remaining water, powdered milk, and pudding mix; continue blending until smooth.
